content: Hi can I speak to the owner about your Google listing? This is urgent.
Hello! You’ve reached XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking to schedule a plumbing, electrical, or HVAC service?
I see your business is not ranking and I can fix that fast! Who’s in charge of marketing? You guys are losing customers every day — you need my help.
Thank you for reaching out, but this number is for scheduling home services only. If you have a plumbing, electrical, or HVAC issue, I can help you book an appointment.
